C. Change of color: This option does not have any significance to Christian beliefs or teachings about going to heaven.

D. Dead: Christians believe in life after death and view physical death as a transition to either heaven or hell. However, this option is not comprehensive enough to provide the complete picture.

E. No longer exist: This option contradicts the Christian belief in eternal life and the existence of heaven.
